name: Scientific Pitch Notation
description: Selects notes in scientific pitch notation. Example C#4 will be selected
content:
A B C D E F G
A4 B4 C4 D4 E4 F4 G4
A# B# C# D# E# F# G#
Ab Bb Cb Db Eb Fb Gb
A#4 B#4 C#4 D#4 E#4 F#4 G#4
Ab4 Bb4 Cb4 Db4 Eb4 Fb4 Gb4
A#10 B#10 C#10 D#10 E#10 F#10 G#10
Ab10 Bb10 Cb10 Db10 Eb10 Fb10 Gb10

This regex can be used to verify if an input string is in a scientific pitch notation form as seen above.
author: Gustavo Spredemann
